items.content_html: Stopwatch Web App is a lightweight and interactive stopwatch built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a clean and responsive UI with essential stopwatch functionalities: Start/Pause: Begin or halt the timer. Reset: Clear the current timing and start over. Lap: Record intermediate time intervals without stopping the main timer.
items.title: stutimistry/stop-watch: Stopwatch Web App is a lightweight and interactive stopwatch built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a clean and responsive UI with essential stopwatch functionalities:  Start/Pause: Begin or halt the timer.  Reset: Clear the current timing and start over.  Lap: Record intermediate time intervals without stopping the main timer.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. items.content_html: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.
items.title: oi-overide/oi: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
